openChange.description: Function called when the hover card opens or closes.

closeDelay.description: The duration from when the mouse leaves the trigger or content until the hover card closes.

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the hover card when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the popover. Useful for composition.

open.description: Whether the hover card is open

openDelay.description: The duration from when the mouse enters the trigger until the hover card opens.

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the popover content
